RecipeDef.label: recharge Mark I droid defense shield
RecipeDef.description: Recharge a used Mark I droid defense shield. Must have at least one charge remaining.\n\nNOTE: Do NOT set this to "do forever" as your pawns will be stuck in a loop of recharging the same shield forever!
RecipeDef.jobString: recharging Mark I droid defense shield.
